title: Summarize R Libraries
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(libminer) lib_summary() #>                                                                                       Library #> 1                        /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.2-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/l_/j1p3t8ms3vsf4g6n9wcl2450d_46rg/T/Rtmp8r0PeT/temp_libpath2208bc49aa3 #> 3                                                  /Users/pandera/Library/R/arm64/4.2/library #>   n_packages #> 1         29 #> 2          1 #> 3        482 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                                       Library #> 1                        /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.2-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/l_/j1p3t8ms3vsf4g6n9wcl2450d_46rg/T/Rtmp8r0PeT/temp_libpath2208bc49aa3 #> 3                                                  /Users/pandera/Library/R/arm64/4.2/library #>   n_packages   lib_size #> 1         29   66559407 #> 2          1      14208 #> 3        482 4455233205

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provide brief summary package libraries machine

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes sizes libraries calculated? Logical; default FALSE.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. lib_size column included sizes = TRUE.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72709151 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
